short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides all Like buttons and disables double-click on Instagram. Lurk in peace.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Don't you hate it when you're stalking someone's Instagram profile and accidentally like one of their old posts? This Chrome extension makes it literally impossible for that to happen. 

More projects at https://unoptimal.com/
